snippet: Bryant had a grand slam, Kyle Schwarber had went 4 for 5, and the Chicago Cubs hit four home runs in all to rout the host Cleveland Indians.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Chicago Cubs rout Cleveland Indians, 17-0; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Bryant had a grand slam, Kyle Schwarber had went 4 for 5, and the Chicago Cubs hit four home runs in all to rout the host Cleveland Indians.

headline.print_headline: Bryant Hits Grand Slam as Cubs Romp, 17-0
headline.main: Kris Bryant Hits Grand Slam as Cubs Romp, 17-0
